Patent Information.Patent Title: Computational Platform For In Silico Combinatorial Sequence Space Exploration And Artificial Evolution Of Peptides
Patent Information.Abstract: Disclosed herein are methods of designing peptides having at least one property of interest, such as Î±-helical propensity, higher net charge, hydrophobicity, and/or hydrophobic moment. Also disclosed herein are novel artificially evolved peptides (e.g., antimicrobial peptides), which may be designed according to the methods described herein, and methods of use thereof.
